.@arrahman #Filmmakers need to travel to get a global sensibility. Otherwise there can be jingoism. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman more directors need to learn music. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman is now writing scripts! #DidYouKnow #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman Slumdog Millionaire was like taking drugs. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman in Indian raagas. #FilmBazaar15 https://t.co/1SikNoANw5
.@arrahman I am re-discovering myself. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman I am working with @MainGulzar on Shah Ali's #film #FilmBazaar15
@arrahman I made a song for #MichaelJackson but could not give him. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman on #MichaelJackson https://t.co/NX8lronlVM
.@arrahman We are artists we are crazy! #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman my kids don't listen to me. #FilmBazaar15 https://t.co/FcrxWXdgES
.@arrahman I am like Robin Hood
column4: I take money from rich and teach music to the underprivileged kids. #FilmBazaar15

text: .@arrahman I met @ZakirHtabla before Roja and was intimidated by him. But he was amazing. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman bismillah khan is the #MichaelJackson of shenai. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman on #MichaelJal #FilmBazaar15 https://t.co/vLrHzYvMN4
.@arrahman my conversations with #MichaelJackson lasted for 2 hours. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman #FilmBazaar15 https://t.co/lzaoTMLrWV
.@arrahman I recorded a song in New York and a full orchestra was there. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman There is a constant struggle with new technology. I need muscle memory to hit the right keys.I #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman #mahatmagandhi  Gandhi was my biggest idol in school. The bombay theme was in a way inspired from him. Empathetic. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman I only listen to western classical or Kawali. In the car I listen to radio. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman The directors play a big part. They pick the tune according to their taste. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman #FilmBazaar15 #musically speaking #arrahman https://t.co/sPci2uHuVa
.@arrahman In India I like narration of the movie rather than reading the script. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman @DannyBoyle87 hates chelo while I love it. He finds it depressing. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman I don't want my music to bigger than the movies. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman I have to cheat my mind a lot. I will see a movie & then not remember. I will have a memory and simply write music. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman I am a fan of older longer Hollywood movies. Now everything is to packed in 2 hours. #FulmBazzar15
.@arrahman I make music instinctively and not intellectually. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman no one apart from my agent knew I was doing Slumdog. #FilmBazaar15
.@arrahman When I did  Slum Dog Millionaire
column4: my agent told me not to because it was an experimental movie. #FilmBazaar15
